:root {
    /* Container */
    --container-max-width: 100%;
    --container-xxs-max-width: 27.5rem; /* 440px */
    --container-xs-max-width: 42.5rem; /* 680px */
    --container-sm-max-width: 61.25rem; /* 980px */
    --container-md-max-width: 71.875rem; /* 1150px */
    --container-lg-max-width: 78.75rem; /* 1260px */
    --container-xl-max-width: 85rem; /* 1360px */
    --container-gutter: 1.25rem;

    --section-vertical-spacing: 2rem;
    --section-vertical-spacing-tight:2rem;

    --section-stack-gap:1.5rem;
    --section-stack-gap-tight:1.5rem;

    /* Form settings */
    --form-gap: 1.25rem; /* Gap between fieldset and submit button */
    --fieldset-gap: 1rem; /* Gap between each form input within a fieldset */
    --form-control-gap: 0.625rem; /* Gap between input and label (ignored for floating label) */
    --checkbox-control-gap: 0.75rem; /* Horizontal gap between checkbox and its associated label */
    --input-padding-block: 0.65rem; /* Vertical padding for input, textarea and native select */
    --input-padding-inline: 0.8rem; /* Horizontal padding for input, textarea and native select */
    --checkbox-size: 0.875rem; /* Size (width and height) for checkbox */

    /* Other sizes */
    --sticky-area-height: calc(var(--announcement-bar-is-sticky, 0) * var(--announcement-bar-height, 0px) + var(--header-is-sticky, 0) * var(--header-is-visible, 1) * var(--header-height, 0px));

    /* RTL support */
    --transform-logical-flip: 1;
    --transform-origin-start: left;
    --transform-origin-end: right;

    /**
     * ---------------------------------------------------------------------
     * TYPOGRAPHY
     * ---------------------------------------------------------------------
     */

    /* Font properties */
    --heading-font-family: Armata, sans-serif;
    --heading-font-weight: 400;
    --heading-font-style: normal;
    --heading-text-transform: normal;
    --heading-letter-spacing: 0.0em;
    --text-font-family: Arimo, sans-serif;
    --text-font-weight: 400;
    --text-font-style: normal;
    --text-letter-spacing: 0.0em;
    --button-font: var(--heading-font-style) var(--heading-font-weight) var(--text-sm) / 1.65 var(--heading-font-family);
    --button-text-transform: uppercase;
    --button-letter-spacing: 0.15em;

    /* Font sizes */--text-heading-size-factor: 1.1;
    --text-h1: max(0.6875rem, clamp(1.375rem, 1.146341463414634rem + 0.975609756097561vw, 2rem) * var(--text-heading-size-factor));
    --text-h2: max(0.6875rem, clamp(1.25rem, 1.0670731707317074rem + 0.7804878048780488vw, 1.75rem) * var(--text-heading-size-factor));
    --text-h3: max(0.6875rem, clamp(1.125rem, 1.0335365853658536rem + 0.3902439024390244vw, 1.375rem) * var(--text-heading-size-factor));
    --text-h4: max(0.6875rem, clamp(1rem, 0.9542682926829268rem + 0.1951219512195122vw, 1.125rem) * var(--text-heading-size-factor));
    --text-h5: calc(0.875rem * var(--text-heading-size-factor));
    --text-h6: calc(0.75rem * var(--text-heading-size-factor));

    --text-xs: 0.875rem;
    --text-sm: 0.9375rem;
    --text-base: 1.0rem;
    --text-lg: 1.125rem;
    --text-xl: 1.25rem;

    /* Rounded variables (used for border radius) */
    --rounded-full: 9999px;
    --button-border-radius: 1.25rem;
    --input-border-radius: 1.25rem;

    /* Box shadow */
    --shadow-sm: 0 2px 8px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.05);
    --shadow: 0 5px 15px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.05);
    --shadow-md: 0 5px 30px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.05);
    --shadow-block: px px px rgb(var(--text-primary) / 0.0);

    /**
     * ---------------------------------------------------------------------
     * OTHER
     * ---------------------------------------------------------------------
     */

    --checkmark-svg-url: url(//laborantin.fr/cdn/shop/t/50/assets/checkmark.svg?v=5085511394707007931739969694);
    --cursor-zoom-in-svg-url: url(//laborantin.fr/cdn/shop/t/50/assets/cursor-zoom-in.svg?v=126523344991815298031739969694);
  }

  [dir="rtl"]:root {
    /* RTL support */
    --transform-logical-flip: -1;
    --transform-origin-start: right;
    --transform-origin-end: left;
  }

  @media screen and (min-width: 700px) {
    :root {
      /* Typography (font size) */
      --text-xs: 0.875rem;
      --text-sm: 0.9375rem;
      --text-base: 1.0rem;
      --text-lg: 1.125rem;
      --text-xl: 1.375rem;

      /* Spacing settings */
      --container-gutter: 2rem;
    }
  }

  @media screen and (min-width: 1000px) {
    :root {
      /* Spacing settings */
      --container-gutter: 3rem;

      --section-vertical-spacing: 3rem;
      --section-vertical-spacing-tight: 3rem;

      --section-stack-gap:2.25rem;
      --section-stack-gap-tight:2.25rem;
    }

    if (!jdgmThemeFixes) return;
    var thisThemeFix = jdgmThemeFixes[Shopify.theme.id];
    if (!thisThemeFix) return;

    if (thisThemeFix.html) {
      document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
        var htmlDiv = document.createElement('div');
        htmlDiv.classList.add('jdgm-theme-fix-html');
        htmlDiv.innerHTML = thisThemeFix.html;
        document.body.append(htmlDiv);
      });
    };

    if (thisThemeFix.css) {
      var styleTag = document.createElement('style');
      styleTag.classList.add('jdgm-theme-fix-style');
      styleTag.innerHTML = thisThemeFix.css;
      document.head.append(styleTag);
    };

    if (thisThemeFix.js) {
      var scriptTag = document.createElement('script');
      scriptTag.classList.add('jdgm-theme-fix-script');
      scriptTag.innerHTML = thisThemeFix.js;
      document.head.append(scriptTag);
    };
  })();
</script><style class="jdgm-theme-fix-style">span.jdgm-subtab__name.jdgm--active {
    background-color: #E9E5DE !important;
    border-radius: 10px !important;
}    
@media (max-width: 1900px) {
      .jdgm-row-stars {display:block!important;}
      .jdgm-rev-widg__summary, .jdgm-histogram, .jdgm-widget-actions-wrapper{width: 100%!important; margin: 10px auto!important}
      .jdgm-histogram, .jdgm-widget-actions-wrapper {margin: 20px auto!important}
      }

@media only screen and (max-width: 768px) {
  .jdgm-carousel--focused-theme .jdgm-carousel-item__review-rating {
    text-align: center !important;
}
 
}



h2.jdgm-carousel-title {
    font-family: var(--heading-font-family) !important;
  	font-weight: var(--heading-font-weight) !important;
  	font-style: var(--heading-font-style) !important;
  	letter-spacing: var(--heading-letter-spacing) !important;
  	text-transform: var(--heading-text-transform) !important;
  	font-size: var(--text-h2) !important;
          
text-align: center !important;
}

.jdgm-carousel-wrapper {
    margin-bottom: -53px !important;
    margin-top: -53px !important;
}
.jdgm-carousel-title-and-link {
	display: flex !important;
  	flex-direction: column !important;
  	justify-content: center !important;
  	align-items: center !important;
  	gap: .5rem !important;
}
.jdgm-all-reviews-rating-wrapper {
	display: flex !important;
  	justify-content: center !important;
  	align-items: center !important;
  	gap: .5rem !important;
}
.jdgm-carousel-item__inner-wrapper {
	background-color: white !important;
  	border-radius: .75rem !important;
}
.jdgm-all-reviews-rating .jdgm-star {
	background: none !important;
  	color: #1E944E !important;
}
@media (max-width: 640px) {
  .jdgm-carousel-title-and-link .jdgm-carousel-title {
  	text-align: center !important;
  }
  .jdgm-carousel-number-of-reviews {
  	font-size: .7rem !important;
  }
}

.jdgm-rev.jdgm-divider-top.jdgm--done-setup.jdgm--leex-done-setup {
    border-radius: 15px !important;
}

.jdgm-rev-widg__actions {
    border-radius: 15px !important;
}

.jdgm-all-reviews__header{
    border-radius: 15px !important;
}

a.jdgm-write-rev-link {
    border-radius: 15px !important;
}
.jdgm-rev-widg__header {
    border-radius: 15px !important;
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {

  .jdgm-carousel-title {
    width: 350px !important;
}
}

span.jdgm-carousel-number-of-reviews {
    font-weight: bold !important;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 800px) {

.jdgm-carousel-wrapper, #shopify-block-7f01b314-06c8-44c8-ad77-9b1e1aec3fd6, #shopify-block-7f01b314-06c8-44c8-ad77-9b1e1aec3fd6 > div{max-width:100% !important;}

}

a.jdgm-all-reviews-page__load-more.jdgm-btn.jdgm-btn--solid{
    border-radius: 15px !important;
  background: #1e944e !important;
      border-color: #1e944e !important;
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 768px) {
    
    .jdgm-histogram.jdgm-temp-hidden {
        display: none !important;
    }
}
.jdgm-row-media {
    text-align: center !important;
}

mg.jdgm-gallery__thumbnail {
    border-radius: 15px !important;
    }

.jdgm-gallery-title  {
 color: black !important;
    }

img.jdgm-gallery__thumbnail {
    border-radius: 15px !important;
}

span.jdgm-rev__buyer-badge, .jdgm-medals-wrapper > div > div > div:nth-child(2) {
display: none !important;
}


span.jdgm-full-rev__timestamp {
    display: none !important;
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 768px) {
  .jdgm-rev__content {
    margin-top: -15px !important;
  }
}


</style><script class="jdgm-theme-fix-script">const observer = new MutationObserver(() => {
    if(jdgm.customizeBadges) {
      jdgm.customizeBadges();

    <script>

      function executeScriptWhenClassFound() {
      document.querySelectorAll('.gm_popup').forEach(popup => {
        const children = Array.from(popup.childNodes);
        children.forEach(node => {
          if (node.textContent?.trim() === 'Ph:' || node.textContent?.trim() === 'Fax:') {
            node.remove();
          }
        });
      }); 
      }
      
      function initMutationObserver() {
        const targetNode = document.body;
        const observerOptions = {
          childList: true,
          subtree: true,
        };
      
        const observer = new MutationObserver((mutationsList) => {
          for (const mutation of mutationsList) {
            if (mutation.type === 'childList') {
              let container = document.querySelector('.gm_popup');
      
              if (container) {
                // console.log(`Class "${container?.className}" and "${container_open?.id}" or "${reward_info?.id}" are now present in the DOM.`);
                executeScriptWhenClassFound();
              }
            }
          }
        });
      
        observer.observe(targetNode, observerOptions);
      }
      
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initMutationObserver);

    </script>
